# Government Tender Announcement: Psychological Risk Assessments
## Overview

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is issuing a request for proposal for psychological risk assessments services to support the health and well-being of offenders in the Pacific Region.

## Tender Details

* Tender Title: Psychological Risk Assessments
* Reference Number: cb-120-83770191
* Solicitation Number: 21801-24-0043
* Tender Closing Date: November 25, 2024, 5:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2025
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2027

## Description

This requirement is for the provision of psychological risk assessment services to offenders in the Pacific Region. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing mental health services, including assessments and reports, as required by the Correctional Service Canada.

## Requirements

The successful bidder must have experience in providing psychological risk assessment services to offenders and be able to demonstrate their ability to work in a correctional setting. The services must be delivered in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework.

## Evaluation Criteria

The bids will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest price
* Compliance with the terms and conditions of the solicitation document
* Quality of the bid submission
* Experience and qualifications of the bidder

## Tendering Procedures

Tenders may be submitted in either English or French. The tender must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys website.

## Submission Requirements

The tender must include the following documents:

* A completed bid form
* A detailed statement of work
* A resume of the principal(s) involved in the project
* Proof of liability insurance and workers' compensation insurance
* Any other documents required by the solicitation document

## File Attached

Please find attached the solicitation document, which includes the detailed statement of work and evaluation criteria.

## Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Amber Craft
Amber.Craft@csc-scc.gc.ca
(236) 380-1379

Note: The tender closing date is November 25, 2024, and the expected contract start date is February 1, 2025. The successful bidder will be required to complete a registration package as part of the contract award.
